content: k1tbl k to bor row 6 k to 1 st before the m k1tbl sm p to m sm k1tbl k to bor with cc row 7 k to 1 st before m k1tbl sm k to m sm k1tbl k to bor row 8 k to 1 st before the m k1tbl sm p to m sm k1tbl k to bor with color specified row 9 k to 1 st before m k1tbl sm k to m sm k1tbl k to bor row 10 k to 1 st before the m k1tbl sm p to m sm k1tbl k to bor row 11 k to 1 st before m k1tbl sm k to m sm k1tbl k to bor row 12 k to 1 st before the m k1tbl sm p to m sm k1tbl k to bor row 13 k to 1 st before m k1tbl sm k to m sm k1tbl k to bor row 14 k to 1 st before the m k1tbl sm p to m sm k1tbl k to bor stockinette section with color specified row 1 k to 1 st before m k1tbl sm k to m sm k1tbl k to bor repeat row 1 11 more times 2 © 2025 lisamartin-knits instructions bind off as follows make sure there is approximately 12 yards or 3 with color 1 grams of yarn left for the bind off bind off all set up using german twisted cast on cast on stitches loosely knit wise removing markers 10 sts pm cast on 350 sts pm cast on 10 sts place bor marker and carefully without finishing twisting join for knitting in the round 370 sts the steek panel is the 10 sts on either side of bor with sharp scissors carefully cut between work garter section cut color 1 and cc the 1st and last stitch of the work a piece of cardboard can be placed between the 2 layers of with color 2 knitting to ensure only one layer will be cut then work stockinette section cut color 2 carefully unravel the stitches to the twisted knit stitch gently steam the yarn ends to make them with color 3 easier to work with knot 5-6 yarn strands work stockinette section cut color 3 together then block to finished measurements after blocking trim fringe to make even if with color 4 necessary work garter section cut color 4 enjoy with color 5 work stockinette section cut color 5 with color 6 work garter section cut color 1 and cc with color 7 work garter section cut color 7 and cc with color 8 work stockinette section cut color 8 with color 9 work garter section cut color 9 and cc with color 10 work stockinette section cut color 10 with color 11 work stockinette section cut color 11 with color 12 work garter section do not cut yarn 3 © 2025 lisamartin-knits
